name: Die Höhlenwelt-Saga: Der leuchtende Kristall
description:
Die Höhlenwelt-Saga: Der leuchtende Kristall is an adventure game developed by Proline Software. It came out on 12-11-1994. Software 2000 published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Die Höhlenwelt-Saga: Der leuchtende Kristall is available on PC.
